tests.description: create random stream with default generating function, BUG :for query like with cte as (select * from test22_create_random limit 1000) select count(*) from cte where id <4it produces no output because the lower query ends when reaches limit while upper query hasnt emitted yet;

statements.query: drop stream if exists test22_create_random
create random stream test22_create_random(id int default rand()%4)
with cte as (select * from test22_create_random ) select max(id) from cte where id<4 limit 1 settings max_threads=1
with cte as (select id from tumble(test22_create_random,2s) group by id,window_start limit 10) select max(id) from cte limit 1 settings max_threads=1
select count(distinct id) from test22_create_random limit 1 settings max_threads=1
select count(distinct id) from tumble(test22_create_random,2s) group by window_start limit 1 settings max_threads=1
with cte as (select * from table(test22_create_random) limit 1000) select count(*) from cte where id<4

tests.description: create random stream with default generating function, limit the amount of data produced per window;

statements.query: drop stream if exists test22_create_random
create random stream test22_create_random(id int default rand()%4) engine Random() settings eps=1000
select cnt - lag(cnt, 1) as diff from (select count(1) as cnt from test22_create_random limit 2 emit periodic 1s) offset 1 settings max_threads=8
select cnt - lag(cnt, 1) as diff from (select count(1) as cnt from test22_create_random limit 2 emit periodic 2s) offset 1 settings max_threads=8

tests.description: create random stream with random_in_type function

statements.query: drop stream if exists test22_create_random
create random stream test22_create_random(id int8 default random_in_type('int8'))
select id >= 0 and id < 256 from test22_create_random limit 5

tests.description: create random stream with random_in_type function

statements.query: drop stream if exists test22_create_random
create random stream test22_create_random(id string default random_in_type('string'))
select id from test22_create_random limit 5

tests.description: create random stream with random_in_type function

statements.query: drop stream if exists test22_create_random
create random stream test22_create_random(id decimal(9,4) default random_in_type('decimal(9,4)'))
select id from test22_create_random limit 5

tests.description: create random stream with random_in_type function

statements.query: drop stream if exists test22_create_random
create random stream test22_create_random(id uint8 default random_in_type('uint8',x->to_uint8(x+10)))
select id >= 10 from test22_create_random limit 5

tests.description: create random stream with random_in_type function

statements.query: drop stream if exists test22_create_random
create random stream test22_create_random(id int8 default random_in_type('int8',5))
select count(distinct id) from test22_create_random limit 1

tests.description: create random stream with random_in_type function

statements.query: drop stream if exists test22_create_random
create random stream test22_create_random(id uint8 default random_in_type('uint8',x->to_uint8(x+10),5))
select id >= 10 and id < 15 from test22_create_random limit 10

tests.description: create random stream with random_in_type function

statements.query: drop stream if exists test22_create_random
create random stream test22_create_random(id uint8 default random_in_type('uint8',5,x->to_uint8(x+10)))
select id >= 10 and id < 15 from test22_create_random limit 10

tests.name: test random stream generating function
tests.description: create random stream with default generating function, limit the amount of data produced per window, eps > the number of threads

statements.query: drop stream if exists test22_create_random
create random stream test22_create_random(id int default rand()%4) engine Random() settings eps=10
select cnt - lag(cnt, 1) as diff from (select count(1) as cnt from test22_create_random limit 2 emit periodic 1s) offset 1 settings max_threads=12
select cnt - lag(cnt, 1) as diff from (select count(1) as cnt from test22_create_random limit 2 emit periodic 2s) offset 1 settings max_threads=12

tests.name: test random stream generating function
tests.description: create random stream with default generating function, limit the amount of data produced per window, eps > the number of threads

statements.query: drop stream if exists test22_create_random
create random stream test22_create_random(id int default rand()%4) engine Random() settings eps=10
select cnt - lag(cnt, 1) as diff from (select count(1) as cnt from test22_create_random limit 2 emit periodic 1s) offset 1 settings max_threads=10
select cnt - lag(cnt, 1) as diff from (select count(1) as cnt from test22_create_random limit 2 emit periodic 2s) offset 1 settings max_threads=10

tests.name: test random stream generating function
tests.description: create random stream with default generating function, limit the amount of data produced per window, set interval_time, check the the number of data produced per interval_time is correct;

statements.query: drop stream if exists test22_create_random
create random stream test22_create_random(id int default rand()%4) engine Random() settings eps=1000, interval_time=100
select cnt - lag(cnt, 1) as diff from (select count(1) as cnt from test22_create_random limit 2 emit periodic 100ms) offset 1 settings max_threads=10

tests.name: test random stream generating function
tests.description: create random stream with default generating function, limit the amount of data produced per window, set interval_time, cannot be diveded by 1000ms, check the the number of data produced per second is correct;

statements.query: drop stream if exists test22_create_random
create random stream test22_create_random(id int default rand()%4) engine Random() settings eps=1000, interval_time=80
select cnt - lag(cnt, 1) as diff from (select count(1) as cnt from test22_create_random limit 2 emit periodic 1s) offset 1 settings max_threads=10

tests.name: test random stream generating function
tests.description: create random stream with default generating function, limit the amount of data produced per window, set an invalid interval_time

statements.query: drop stream if exists test22_create_random
create random stream test22_create_random(id int default rand()%4) engine Random() settings eps=1000, interval_time=15000
select cnt - lag(cnt, 1) as diff from (select count(1) as cnt from test22_create_random limit 2 emit periodic 1s) offset 1 settings max_threads=10

tests.name: test random stream generating function
tests.description: create random stream with default generating function, limit the amount of data produced per window, set an invalid interval_time

statements.query: drop stream if exists test22_create_random
create random stream test22_create_random(id int default rand()%4) engine Random() settings eps=1000, interval_time=0
select cnt - lag(cnt, 1) as diff from (select count(1) as cnt from test22_create_random limit 2 emit periodic 1s) offset 1 settings max_threads=10

tests.name: test random stream generating function
tests.description: create random stream with default generating function, limit the amount of data produced per window, set interval_time, cannot be diveded by 1000ms, check the the number of data produced per interval is correct;

statements.query: drop stream if exists test22_create_random
create random stream test22_create_random(id int default rand()%4) engine Random() settings eps=1000, interval_time=80
select count(1) from tumble(test22_create_random, 80ms) group by window_start limit 5 settings max_threads=20
